Text: Just saw the movie last night.  Thanks for uploading this! :-)

Well, I was duped into believing this was the movie lol. Guess it's just the sound track. Guess I should have read that it was an audio file first. For all who are looking for the movie, this is just the soundtrack.

Just watched the movie, and I loved the music!
Especially the medieval-themed ones.
Thanks for uploading this!
nice torrent & fast. must download this. lol...
